body:
I recently downloaded and booted into one of the Spack Docker container (`spack/ubuntu-xenial`), but was then unable to execute `spack load` commands.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ docker run -it spack/ubuntu-xenial
$ spack install tar ; spack load tar
...
```

### Error Message

```
Lmod Warning: MODULEPATH is undefined


Lmod has detected the following error: 
The following module(s) are unknown: "tar-1.31-gcc-5.4.0-jmhypcl"

   Please check the spelling or version number. Also try "module spider ..."
```

### Information on your system

This was tried on ubuntu 16.04, with Docker version 18.03.0-ce, build 0520e24.
title: Unable to `spack load` packages in Spack Docker container
